mapper.select: select * from comment where recomment is null order by commentNum desc limit #{page} , #{pagesize}
select count(comment) from comment where recomment is null
mapper.insert: insert into comment(memId , star,comment,commentNum,commentTime) values(#{memId} ,#{star} ,#{comment} ,(select IFNULL(MAX(commentNum),0)+1 from comment C) , #{commentTime})
mapper.select: select * from comment where recomment = #{commentNum} limit #{page} , #{pagesize}
select count(comment) from comment where recomment = #{commentNum}
mapper.insert: insert into comment(recomment,comment,commentNum,commentTime) values(#{recomment} ,#{comment} ,(select IFNULL(MAX(commentNum),0)+1 from comment C) , #{commentTime})
mapper.update: update comment set picture = #{picture} where commentNum = (select re.num from (select max(commentNum) num from comment) re);
